reviewText: Good video with lots of information
OVER 3 HOURS  OF FIRST RATE INSTRUCTION  ON A DVD. NOT IN ANY WAY TO DETRACT FOR COL. JEFF COOPER'S WORK, THIS IS A ABSOLUTE MUST TO HAVE IN YOUR LIBRARY.

I was looking for a DVD that was basic yet comprehensive. This was the only handguns 101 DVD I could locate and took a chance. It is perfect for my needs as a beginner who wanted step-by-step instruction in all phases of hand gun handling. Highly recommended. It is very lengthy but that's what comprehensive is.
I'm only 80% through the lengthy video which if full of content provided in a straight forward rational format.  A good video to see before you get your first gun or a conceal and carry.
